name: Residence lots; sale or leases
text:
C.  Residential Uses
     The board may dispose of public land for personal residence purposes (1) by sale in fee simple or lease at public auction as provided in sections 171-14 and 171-16, or (2) by sale or lease of lots by drawing as provided in sections 171-15 and 171-16. [L 1962, c 32, pt of §2; Supp, §103A-43; HRS ; am L 1970, c 184, §1]
